meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat seizures.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed metrazols to control the seizures.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a supply of metrazols in case of a seizure.
meanings.sent3: The metrazols danced in the medicine cabinet, ready to stop any seizures.
meanings.sent4: The metrazols were like guardians, protecting her from the seizures' wrath.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of metrazols glowed with the power to stop seizures in their tracks.
